name: Rhythm MMO
description:
PLEASE NOTE that all usernames must be 8 or more characters long
DM lily#3139 on discord if you require a reset or your key isn't working.

Thank you!

GENERAL CONTROLS: 

E: changes rhythm mode 

WASD: move around 

SHIFT: show beatmap 

UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT: hit notes (must be holding shift) 

B: open inventory

RHYTHM MODES: 

0: none 

1: dig one block down (must be within the fence currently) 

2: dig 3x3 (must be within the fence currently) 

3: hit users/enemies via melee 

4: hit users/enemies in 3x3 range 

View character sheet for level, stats, currency and other debug information
